feature -- Access
f_color../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_colorcolor: ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR -- Currently selected color. local color_struct: FalsePOINTER do if not ../implementation_gtk/ev_standard_dialog_imp.xml#f_user_clicked_okuser_clicked_ok and then attached ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_internal_set_colorinternal_set_color as l_internal_set_color then Result := l_internal_set_color.Falsetwin else color_struct := {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_c_gdk_color_struct_allocatec_gdk_color_struct_allocate {../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_color_selection_get_current_colorgtk_color_selection_get_current_color ({../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xmlGTK2}.../implementation_gtk/gtk2.xml#f_gtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_color_selectiongtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_color_selection (../implementation_gtk/ev_any_imp.xml#f_c_objectc_object), color_struct) create Result.../interface/ev_color.xml#f_make_with_8_bit_rgbmake_with_8_bit_rgb ({../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_redgdk_color_struct_red (color_struct) // 256, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_greengdk_color_struct_green (color_struct) // 256, {../implementation_gtk/gtk.xmlGTK}.../implementation_gtk/gtk.xml#f_gdk_color_struct_bluegdk_color_struct_blue (color_struct) // 256) color_struct.Falsememory_free end end

feature {NONE} -- Implementation
f_internal_set_color../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_internal_set_colorinternal_set_color: detachable ../interface/ev_color.xmlEV_COLOR -- Color explicitly set with ../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_set_colorset_color.
feature {NONE} -- Externals
f_gtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_colorsel../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_gtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_colorselgtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_colorsel (a_c_struct: FalsePOINTER): FalsePOINTER external "C [struct <ev_gtk.h>] (GtkColorSelectionDialog): EIF_POINTER" alias "colorsel" end
f_gtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_ok_button../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_gtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_ok_buttongtk_color_selection_dialog_struct_ok_button (a_c_struct: FalsePOINTER): FalsePOINTER external "C [struct <ev_gtk.h>] (GtkColorSelectionDialog): EIF_POINTER" alias "ok_button" end

f_interface../implementation_gtk/ev_color_dialog_imp.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_color_dialog.xmlEV_COLOR_DIALOG note option: stable attribute end
